description:
Manufactured by the UK`s Royal Small Arms Factory. She`s a battle rifle and http://anidb.net/ch39929 [Funko]`s older sister. She gets excellent grades, is very popular, and on top of that she`s beautiful. Faru is a leader in the high school division and the first one to call FNC "Funko" (apparently).
"It`s a match, Funko."
Source: ANN
name: Faru
